subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Louis Oosthuizen and his caddie, Zack Rasego, are entering the final round of the British Open with a four-stroke lead and as the image of a “rainbow nation.”
snippet: Louis Oosthuizen and his caddie, Zack Rasego, are entering the final round of the British Open with a four-stroke lead and as the image of a “rainbow nation.”
